overview: Yehuda Doron serves as the CEO for WebCollage. Prior to WebCollage Yehuda held executive-level positions at Cheyenne Communications, Cheyenne Software, CA and Texas Instruments. At Texas Instruments, Yehuda helped grow the companyâ€™s enterprise supply-chain management division to annual revenues of $120 million. Later, Yehuda served as CEO of Cheyenne Communications, which later eventually merged with publicly-traded Cheyenne Software. He performed a broad range of duties at Cheyenne Software including running international marketing, US and international sales, R&D and customer support/service. Yehuda is also an active investor and board member of several high technology companies.
